metadata.name: Hands off my home!
metadata.description:
NFT+ original painting

February 24, my world has turned over.  It was so 
hard to finish this artwork, everyday I fight myself to make art in the same time when Ukraine fight to be independent.  Ukraine fight for democracy.  Ukraine fight against biggest country on the planet, against old and ugly totalitarianism.

Millions of people were forced to leave their homes. Thousands of home were destroyed forever.  Hundreds of people underwent violence in my homeland.  I haven't seen my family and my friends almost 5 month and i wanna scream about it. 

In my art you can see ugly monsters - i don't like to draw war machines. 

This Year - is year of big changes. Year of big losses. Year of truth. Open your eyes. 

Humanity should change. Change priorities. Appreciate life. Appreciate nature. Respect each other, respect different cultures. 

But firstly: HANDS OFF UKRAINE!
